DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project investigate magnitude load base 12 week rehabilitation regime patellar tendinopathy influence clinical outcome , tendon structure function . The investigator hypothesize great magnitude ( 90 % 1RM ) load yield positive clinical outcome , tendon structure function patient patellar tendinopathy compare low magnitude loading ( 55 % 1 RM ) total exercise volume equal group .
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized control intervention study one year follow-up
DOC.criteria: Uni bilateral patellar tendinopathy Symptoms > 3 month Ultrasonographical tendon swell Ultrasonographical hypoechoic area doppler BMI 18.530 Patellar tendinopathy > 12 month Previous knee surgery Confounding diagnosis knee joint Diabetes arthritis Previous corticosteroid injection patellar tendinopathy Smoking Being elite volleyball player
